message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this high-end product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $9000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $14000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $14000. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?
I'm still confident that the product is worth more than $11000, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise further. I'm counteroffering at $13500. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?
